titles.title: Safeguarding Tunisian Democracy Act of 2023
Safeguarding Tunisian Democracy Act of 2023
Safeguarding Tunisian Democracy Act of 2023
A bill to foster Tunisia's democratic institutions, to limit funds until Tunisia restores checks and balances, and to authorize the creation of a fund to support democratic reforms.
